thread.section_title: Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent | upad.co.uk
thread.title: Joanna Lott
thread.title_full: Upad - The UK's largest online letting agent reviewed by Joanna Lott

author: Joanna Lott
title: Joanna Lott
text: Really great alternative to a letting agent. I got texts and emails with all viewings and the flat was let within a week. Many add on services available such as referencing, floor plans, contracts etc so you can choose how much assistance you want. One feature that could be improved, though not essential, is for the prospective tenants to be able to get a full message to you rather than just name and phone number/email as some were just general enquiries such as do you accept pets etc. Overall brilliant and would use again.
